mapper.insert: insert into site (name, types, contactor_name, contactor_phone, topics, drive_time, addr, description, pics, attach_files, province_id, city_id, county_id, fee) VALUES (#{name},#{types},#{contactorName},#{contactorPhone},#{topics},#{driverTime},#{addr},#{description},#{pics},#{attchFiles},#{provinceId},#{cityId},#{countyId},#{fee})
